text: Mikio Chiba (born 1 May 1935) is a Japanese equestrian. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics and the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Japan Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Mikio Chiba
